column4: can anybody help me to create a new partition on my Hard Drive?
can anybody help me to create a new partition on my Hard Drive?
can anybody help me to create a new partition on my Hard Drive?
Gparted will do it for you, have you got any data on the disk?
yes i have data on the disk.. and i started to run Gparted but i was afraid to screw uup and delete everything
can you just follow with me so i dont mess up?
There should be an option in gparted to resize a partition, it will check what data is there and it'll move it into the resized partition
if you go to the partition drop down menu in gparted, there should be a resize/move option, use this and it should be safe
in the partition menu they are all disabled to use
is the one i am using now
I recommend backing up your data just to be safe
ok.. i will read it.. thanks for helping..
If you're important data is less than 2GB then I recommend using Ubuntu One to store it for you
it is already backed up.. i just want to bring it back.. but i dont want to put with the sistem partition
Then the gparted live CD will do what you want, just remember to leave a few GB extra on the Ubuntu partition to make sure it has room to grow
